ygData.subject: Re: unclear on the concept
ygData.msgSnippet: The dirk is the better weapon & should be primary. Also because the pugius is quicker, you have more chances to dualwield. ... From: Elijah Meeker
ygData.messageBody:
The dirk is the better weapon & should be primary.

Also because the pugius is quicker, you have more chances to dualwield.

-----Original Message-----
From: Elijah Meeker <elijah@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 22, 1999 1:56 PM
Subject: [eqbards] unclear on the concept


>From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>
>I have a Dragoon dirk (6/23) and a pugius (5/21) theory says that I should
>put the pugius as my main weapon but it's ratio is lower than the dragoon
>dirk. So, over time, wouldn't I be doing more damage (at level 17) by
having
>the Dragoon dirk as my primary?
>
>Tszaaz
>
>
>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
>ONElist: your connection to like-minds and kindred spirits.
